title: United Nations Secretariat to the High Level Panel on System-wide Coherence

quotes: Mr. Lennart Båge from Sweden was elected President of the International Fund for Agricultural Development in 2001 and again in 2005.
In 2002, Mr. Kofi Annan designated Mr. Båge as chairman of the High-Level Committee on Programmes.

organizations.name: International Fund for Agricultural Development (IFAD)
quotes: President of the International Fund for Agricultural Development (IFAD)
Mr. Lennart Båge from Sweden was elected President of the International Fund for Agricultural Development in 2001 and again in 2005.

organizations.name: Governing Council of IFAD
quotes: He also served as Chairman of the Governing Council of IFAD and Co-Chairman of the High Level Special Committee on Resource Requirements and Related Governance Issues.

organizations.name: High Level Special Committee on Resource Requirements and Related Governance Issues
quotes: He also served as Chairman of the Governing Council of IFAD and Co-Chairman of the High Level Special Committee on Resource Requirements and Related Governance Issues.

organizations.name: United Nations system
quotes: He joined IFAD with nearly 25 years of experience in international development, and longstanding, active involvement in the United Nations system and multilateral finance institutions.

organizations.name: Sweden’s Ministry for Foreign Affairs
quotes: He previously served as Head of the Department for International Development Cooperation in Sweden’s Ministry for Foreign Affairs.

organizations.name: International Development Association
quotes: Mr. Båge, who has rank of Ambassador in the Foreign Ministry, also served as Sweden’s Deputy for the International Development Association,

organizations.name: Asian Development Bank
quotes: and as Alternate Governor for the Asian, African and Inter-American Development Banks and Vice-Chairman of the Board of Governors of the African Capacity Building Foundation.
